guidelines.title: Customer Guidelines
guidelines.subtitle: Important guidelines to follow when using LaundryZone services

thank_you.title: Thank you
thank_you.content: Thank you for using LaundryZone services. Following the above guidelines will ensure comfortable and safe service.

washing_instructions.title: Washing according to instructions
washing_instructions.content: Please note that customers are responsible for the results obtained from using washing machines and dryers according to the factory label and washing instructions on the items to be washed.

color_separation.title: Separate white and colored items
color_separation.content: White and colored items must be separated by color when washing. This prevents the laundry from losing or deteriorating in color!

check_pockets.title: Check items in pockets
check_pockets.content: Check all items in pockets one by one before washing (tissues, toothpicks, masks, keys, pins, candy, etc.). Please note that customers will be responsible for any damage or injury caused by customer negligence.

stretchy_items.title: Stretchy items
stretchy_items.content: Wash stretchable fabrics, knits, silk, and poly materials according to instructions

supervision.title: Supervision during washing
supervision.content: It is risky to cause delays for other customers and lose items, so do not leave for a long time while using washing and dryer machines.

no_pets.title: No pets allowed
no_pets.content: It is dangerous to suffocate and choke, so it is strictly forbidden to put pets in washing machines and dryer machines or enter them.

capacity_limit.title: Do not exceed machine capacity
capacity_limit.content: If you exceed the capacity of washing and drying machines, your laundry may lose color and be incompletely washed, and equipment may be damaged, so we recommend using according to the established capacity.

household_only.title: For household use only
household_only.content: All our machines are designed only for household washing, and it is strictly forbidden to use them for other purposes. /including: Shoes, carpets, car covers, oily technical items, etc./

closing_time.title: Come 2 hours before closing
closing_time.content: Washing takes 1-2 hours, so come 2 hours before closing in the evening.

gentle_use.title: Use machines gently
gentle_use.content: Close all machine doors gently and do not pull handles forcefully.

follow_staff.title: Follow staff advice
follow_staff.content: Our staff will give you instructions and advice on how to use cards and machines. Our staff will not be responsible for washing and drying your items, and you will operate your machines yourself according to our staff's instructions "SELF-SERVICE".

customer_responsibility.title: Customer responsibility
customer_responsibility.content: Customers are fully responsible for the "RESULTS" caused by not following our staff's advice.

color_restoration.title: Color restoration not possible
color_restoration.content: We do not restore colors of items that have changed color or been used for a long time, we only wash dirt.

stain_removal.title: Stain removal instructions
stain_removal.content: We recommend using special stain removers and deep-cleaning laundry detergents for stains and deep dirt on laundry.

staff_respect.title: Respect for staff
staff_respect.content: Please treat our service staff with respect, do not cut in line in front of customers who came before you, do not verbally abuse, do not physically touch others, and serve politely without being rude.

branches.title: Our Branches

banner.title: Our Services
banner.subtitle: High-quality laundry service in a comfortable environment

main.title: Premium Laundry Service
main.description: LG/Samsung equipment, fast cycles, clean environment

story.title: Our Story
story.content: LaundryZone was established in 2020 and is Mongolia's first self-service laundry. We provide high-quality service using LG/Samsung equipment.

partners.title: Our Equipment Partners
partners.subtitle: We partner with world-leading manufacturers to provide the best laundry experience

lg.name: LG Commercial
lg.desc: Premium commercial washing machines and dryers designed for high-performance and energy efficiency in commercial environments.

samsung.name: Samsung Commercial
samsung.desc: Advanced commercial laundry equipment featuring smart technology, superior cleaning performance, and innovative features.

timeline.title: Our Growth Story
timeline.subtitle: We are working to provide fast, low-cost washing and cleaning services to everyone through "SELF-SERVICE LAUNDRY - LAUNDRYZONE".
timeline.branch_1_desc: First branch opened with 17, 20, 30kg washers, 11kg and 25kg dryers, 6 pairs of shoe washers and dryers - total of 12 machines.
timeline.branch_3_desc: Branch opened at Yarmag - Food City.

about_section.title: About Us
about_section.description: Laundryzone Mongolia was established with the goal of providing modern automatic washing, drying, and care services to users in accordance with international standards. We are working to make the lives of Ulaanbaatar citizens easier and more comfortable.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: To spread a new culture of washing and drying in Mongolia, helping every user save time and embrace a clean, comfortable lifestyle.

mission.title: Our Mission
content: To offer fast, prompt, and high-quality service
To save customers' time with modern automatic equipment
To implement international standards of cleanliness and hygiene

items.title: Self-service automatic system
items.description: users can use it according to their schedule

items.title: Affordable price
items.description: policy to provide service at an affordable price for everyone

about_section.final_statement: Laundryzone is consistently delivering efficient and reliable services by localizing the best practices and technology of the Korean Laundryzone franchise for Mongolian consumers.

guidelines.title: Customer Attention
guidelines.subtitle: Important guidelines to follow when using LaundryZone services

washing_instructions.title: Follow Washing Instructions
washing_instructions.content: Please note that customers are responsible for the results obtained when using washing machines and dryers according to the manufacturer's labels and washing instructions on the items.

color_separation.title: Separate White and Colored Items
color_separation.content: White and colored items must be separated by color when washing. This helps prevent color bleeding and damage to your laundry!

check_pockets.title: Check Items in Pockets
check_pockets.content: Check all items in pockets before washing (tissues, toothpicks, masks, keys, pins, candy, etc.). Please note that customers will be held responsible for any damage or loss due to customer negligence.

delicate_fabrics.title: Handle Delicate Fabrics Carefully
delicate_fabrics.content: Wash items made of stretchable fabrics, knits, silk, and poly materials according to instructions.

supervision.title: Supervise During Washing
supervision.content: It is risky to leave washing and dryer machines unattended for long periods as it may cause inconvenience to other customers and risk losing your items.

no_pets.title: No Pets Allowed
no_pets.content: It is strictly forbidden to put pets inside washing machines and dryers as it is dangerous and can cause suffocation.

capacity_limit.title: Do Not Exceed Machine Capacity
capacity_limit.content: We recommend using machines according to their specified capacity as exceeding the capacity of washing and drying machines may cause color loss, incomplete washing, and risk damaging the equipment.

household_only.title: Household Use Only
household_only.content: All our machines are designed for household laundry only, and using them for other purposes is strictly prohibited. (Including: shoes, carpets, car covers, technical items, etc.)

closing_time.title: Arrive 2 Hours Before Closing
closing_time.content: Laundry takes 1-2 hours, so please arrive 2 hours before closing time.

gentle_handling.title: Handle Machines Gently
gentle_handling.content: Close all machine doors gently and do not force handles.

staff_assistance.title: Follow Staff Instructions
staff_assistance.content: Our staff will provide guidance on using cards and machines. Our staff will not wash or dry your items, and you will operate the machines yourself according to staff instructions - "SELF-SERVICE".

responsibility.title: Customer Responsibility
responsibility.content: Customers are fully responsible for any "RESULTS" arising from not following our staff's advice.

color_restoration.title: Color Restoration Not Possible
color_restoration.content: We do not restore colors of faded or long-used items, we only wash dirt.

stain_removal.title: Stain Removal Guidelines
stain_removal.content: We recommend using specialized stain removers and deep-cleaning detergents for stains and deep dirt on laundry.

respect.title: Respect Staff
respect.content: Please treat our service staff with respect, do not cut in line ahead of customers who arrived earlier, do not verbally abuse, do not physically touch, and do not violate others' rights with rude behavior.

thank_you.title: Thank You
thank_you.content: Thank you for using LaundryZone services. Following the above guidelines will ensure comfortable and safe service.
